mapper.select: select YDJ_ID, APP_ID, CRT_TIME, PRODUCT_TYPE, IS_AML_FLG, AREA_TYPE, CONT_CUST_TYPE, FINAL_CUST_TYPE, CIF_AGE, IS_GREY_CIF, WORK_AGE, CDT_SCORE, CDT_CARD_DEBT, REALY_M_INCOME, WAGE_FLOW_MINCOME, TAX_MINCOME, JOB_MINCOME, SOCIAL_SETY_MINCOME, PUB_ACLA_FUNDS_MINCOME, SPOUSE_MINCOME, RENT_MINCOME, TAX_LIST_MINCOME, SYS_PRO_MINCOME, WAGE_FLOW_RATE, WAGE_FLOW_DUCT, JOB_RATE, JOB_DUCT, TAX_RATE, TAX_DUCT, PUB_ACLA_FUNDS_RATIO, PUB_ACLA_FUNDS_UP, WF_PAF_AMT, WF_INCOME_AMT, TAX_PAF_AMT, TAX_INCOME_AMT, JOB_BF_MINCOME, JOB_AF_MINCOME, TAX_THRESHOLD, PROPOSED_LMT, PB_UN_PLGE_LOAN_DEBT, PB_PLGE_LOAN_DEBT, PB_CDT_CARD_EXP, PB_UN_PLGE_LOAN_EXP, LOAN_LMT, CIF_INCOME_MUL, CDT_LOAN_SC, DTI_LMT_UP, CIF_DTI_UP, UN_PLGE_LOAN_DEBT, UN_PLGE_EXP, PLGE_LOAN_DEBT, DTI_VIOL_LMT_UP, CIF_DTI_VIOL_UP, CP_DTI_LMT_UP, CP_DTI_VIOL_LMT_UP, OPEN_LMT_UP, OPEN_VIOL_LMT_UP, H_FINAN_CIF_LMT, MUE_VIOL_LMT_UP, RANK_INCOME, CIF_LMT_DOWN, IRB_LOAN_SC, FOUNDING_Y, HOUSE_CTFN, CAR_CTFN, VIOL_LMT_UP, TRGER_RULE_CODE, UN_PLGE_DTI, CP_DTI, MUE, DITY_NAME_TYPE, APPR_RST, APPR_RISK_RST, IS_HAVE_PBOC, TT_PAY_RATE, PAY, PAY_DUE, REVOLVING_LABEL, CIF_LABEL, LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL, FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL, APP_SCROE, IS_HAVE_PB_DATA, LOANCARD12MACTIVECOUNT, LOAN12MACTIVECOUNT, STANDARDLOANCARD12MACTIVECOUNT, MACTIVETHAN3CARDAMT12, MACTIVETHAN3CARDOVERDRAFT12, LOANCARD12MUNREPAYMENTCOUNT, LOANCARDMAXACCTAGE, CREDITCARD24MMAXARCOUNT, OTHERLOANCARDMAXSECAMT, LOAN24MMAXARCOUNT, CARDORLOANACCTSTATUSABL, CREDITCARD12MDUEABL, CREDITCARD3MDUEABL, CARDORLOAN3MDUEABL, LOANCARDDUEABL, LOANDUEABL, LOAN12MDUEABL, LOAN3MDUEABL, NEWLOANCARDACCTCOUNTABL, LOANCARDAMTUSERATIOABL, CARDLOANSELECTCOUNTABL, PAYMENTMONTHAMT, IS_ACTIVE_CARD, ACTIVE_CARD_SHAR_AMT, AMTUSERATIO, CREDITCARDMAXDUECOUNT, LOANMAXDUESTATUS, CIFMUSTPROVEMATERIAL, CIFMUSTPROVEMATERIALREMARK, PRODUCTAMTDOWN, REF_UN_PLGE_DTI, REF_CP_DTI, REF_MUE, UN_PLGE_DTI_RANGE, CP_DTI_RANGE, UN_PLGE_DTI_RANGE_LV, CP_DTI_RANGE_LV, MUE_LV, APPR_MATRIX, POLICY_CD, REJECT_CD, VIOLATION_CD, HOUSE_TOTAL_RATIO, WAGE_INCOME_RATE, WAGE_INCOME_DUCT, TAX_INCOME_RATE, TAX_INCOME_DUCT, WAGE_INCOME_AVG_SUM, TAX_INCOME_AVG_SUM, TAC_TYPE, FQZ_RST, FQZ_RST_DESP, IS_SPECIAL_CUST, EDU_PROV_RST, DECISION_RESULT, DECISION_DESP, SAMP_M_INCOME, CIF_CP_DTI_UP, CIF_CP_DTI_VIOL_UP, CIF_OPEN_LMT_UP, CIF_OPEN_LMT_VIOL_UP, VIOL_REF_LMT, GENDER_CD, INTEREST_RATE_PRODUCT from OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE where APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select s.APP_ID, s.CRT_TIME, s.app_scroe, e.NUMBER_READ, s.CDT_SCORE, s.DECISION_RESULT, s.DECISION_DESP, s.PROPOSED_LMT, s.TAC_TYPE, o.CREDIT_DECISION_RESULT, o.CREDIT_DECISION_DESC, s.VIOL_LMT_UP, s.VIOL_REF_LMT, s.TAX_LIST_MINCOME, s.UN_PLGE_DTI, s.CP_DTI, s.REF_MUE, s.MUE, s.Reject_Cd, s.SAMP_M_INCOME, s.JOB_BF_MINCOME, w.MATCH_INCOME, s.CIF_LABEL as cust_level_tag_a, s.RATE_CODE as RATE_NAME, s.LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL as cust_level_tag_b, return_Value(s.APP_ID,'2',s.LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL) as REPAY_RATIO_VALUE, s.FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL as cust_level_tag_c, return_Value(s.APP_ID,'3',s.FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL) as repay_free_value, s.RATE_CODE_VALID_TIME as cust_level_tag_d, return_Value(s.APP_ID,'4','LLDMSXRQ') as RATE_VALUE_LOSE_DATE, s.DL_AMT from opas_biz_inp_appl_c1 t left join OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE s on t.app_id = s.app_id left join OPAS_PBOC_CREDIT_CUE e on t.APP_ID = e.app_id left join OPAS_YDJ_SYSRESULT_INFO o on t.APP_ID =o.app_id left join OPAS_YDJ_ENHANCE_COLLECT k on t.app_id = k.app_id left join OPAS_YDJ_INDUSTRY_INCOMEMACHT w on ( w.city_code = substr(s.app_id,9, 2) and w.industry_code = k.INDUSTRY_CODE and w.job_code = k.position_code and w.UNION_TYPE = t.C1_COKIND and w.EDUCATION = t.C1_Educls) where s.APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by e.crt_time desc,e.batch_date desc) where rownum = 1

CIF_DTI_VIOL_UP, CP_DTI_LMT_UP, CP_DTI_VIOL_LMT_UP, OPEN_LMT_UP, OPEN_VIOL_LMT_UP, H_FINAN_CIF_LMT, MUE_VIOL_LMT_UP, RANK_INCOME, CIF_LMT_DOWN, IRB_LOAN_SC, FOUNDING_Y, HOUSE_CTFN, CAR_CTFN, VIOL_LMT_UP, TRGER_RULE_CODE, UN_PLGE_DTI, CP_DTI, MUE, DITY_NAME_TYPE, APPR_RST, APPR_RISK_RST, IS_HAVE_PBOC, TT_PAY_RATE, PAY, PAY_DUE, REVOLVING_LABEL, CIF_LABEL, LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL, CIF_OPEN_LMT_UP, CIF_OPEN_LMT_VIOL_UP, VIOL_REF_LMT, GENDER_CD, INTEREST_RATE_PRODUCT,WF_RESULT, RATE_CODE as RATE_NAME,DL_AMT from OPAS_FICO_YDJ_BLAZE where APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
